key_rules: If the match is tied, Super Over will be played. If still tied, additional Super Overs will continue until a winner is decided.

qualification.league: Each team plays 2 league matches in its group.
qualification.semi_final: Only the Group Winner qualifies for Semi-Finals.
qualification.tie_for_top: If two teams are level on points for the top position in a group, an additional match will be played to decide qualification and group winner.
